response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory offer at $9,500. This price reflects the product's true worth and the opportunity it presents to you. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll be securing a high-quality asset at an exclusive rate. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product into your world.", "product_price": 9500}
